title: Test Note
text: This is a sample note. You can create, edit, and delete notes with Jot. To create a note, click the +Note button, add your title and text, and click the Create button. It's that easy. To edit a note, select the note you wish to edit, then click the Edit button. You can then edit the title and/or the text. To delete a note, select the note you wish to delete, then click the Delete button, and POOF, it's gone! Go on... Give it a try!

title: Lemonade Recipe
text: I saw this on the back of a bag of lemons: 1. squeeze the juice of 5 lemons. 2. Add to 2 quarts of water. 3. Add 1 cup of sugar. 4. Stir well and refrigerate. Makes 2 quarts.

title: Social Good Ipsum

title: Bring a gift
text: We've been invited to Mara's birthday party. We should bring a gift. I know she loves stemware.

title: Bake a cake
text: We need a cake, chocolate, to celebrate my graduation. It has to be chocolate. I would love a couple of layers. Be sure it's chocolate. Did I mention it needs to be chocolate? Like seriously, whatever is created, add more chocolate!

title: Finish Outcomes HW
text: Send the following to Outcomes ASAP: 1. Completed resume(PDF Google docs link) 2. Completed cover letter. 3. Links to my updated portfolio, updated LinkedIn, and GA Pages.
